tags: None
review: Doctor Khaiwan provides fantastic service. He not only performs the procedure with almost no pain but he also explains the problems in simple manner for patients to understand. He was able to identify the issue with my teeth in one sitting while other doctor i visited could not identify the issue. I would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For some one who is petrified of dentists, the notion stands changed after visiting Dr. Shroff. He is a very patient doctor with thorough professionalism. I am extremely happy with my visit to Dr. Shroff‚Äôs clinic and I would highly highly recommend this place for anyone with dental issues.
Thank You Dr. Shroff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Kaiwan is one of the few doctors that take time to first explain the situation and then proceed to the treatment. He is very conscious of the pain you might go through and extremely patient and does not ruch you during procedures. 
Overall going to him is not a stressful experience at all unlike the usual dentist visits!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kaiwan is a doctor I would absolutely recommend anyone to with a dental problem. He is very observant about the problem a patient faces and will profoundly solve it. He is also very friendly and down-to-earth. So, again, would highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. It is always a pleasure treating you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I  have been terrified when visiting a dentist all my life. Dr Shroff made me feel very comfortable and at ease. He was very patient and  I am now encouraged to get other treatments done. He gives enough time and pays attention to  every small detail. I love the fact that he follows up even after the treatment is over but never pushes into getting more work done if he does not find it necessary. I surely recommend him  to everyone.

review: Very warm and comforting. I am very scared of dentists and Dr Shroff was very patient. My entire family has started to go to him for all dental issues - however big or small.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a very good experience during my appointment with Dr. Kaiwan Shroff. He is extremely polite, friendly and answers all questions with patience. I'm satisfied with my treatment (root canal + general checkup) and will surely recommend to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kaiwan was very kind, reassuring and took the time to address my queries. I was very satisfied with his treatment and would definitely recommend him.
